item.title: Node & SQL assignment
item.description: You are required to create a back-end service that will help capture basic information about prospective students who come to inquire here at Umuzi. database setup Set up a postgresql database on your computer. Please use Docker to do this. You can find more information here: TOPICS: Intro to Docker and Docker-compose Create a table inside the database and name it Visiters. The table must contain the following fields : id: This should be automatically generated by SQL visitor name visitor’s age date of visit time of visit name of the person who assisted the visitor comments Helloworld Before you dive into anything too intense, let’s make sure that you can get node to connect to your database.
